alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:03PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Churchill and south central Pershing Counties through 945 PM PDT... At 903 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trinity Junction, or 16 miles southwest of Lovelock, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, torrential rain, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lovelock, Trinity Junction, Lovelock Derby Field Airport, Junction I 80 And Nv 396/857 (exit 112), Junction I 80 And U.S 95 (exit 83), Toulon Peak and Trinity Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
